title: Special Topics in Finance 1
ziele:
• In depth look at the content of the first main courses.
  • Understanding how security markets function
  • Learning more about instruments used for the technical analysis of securities analysis in cases of trading decisions
  • Increasing the understanding of a general trading environment by introducing the microstructure of securities trading, trading strategies and trading risks.
lehrinhalte:
The course explores the base concepts of securities trading, particularly an overview of individual types of securities highlighting the structure of securities exchange. The main section focuses on trading stocks using technical analysis. Subsequently the course reviews specifics of stock trading and risk management.

  • Intro/review of financial instruments tradable securities.
    • Money market instruments
    • Bonds
    • Stocks
    • Indices
    • Derivative Instruments
  • Securities markets
    • Floor trading / Elektronischer Handel (Limit Orderbücher) / Over the counter trade
    • Trading participants
    • Clearing & Regulation
  • Technical securities analysis
    • Dow theory & charting
    • Technical indicators
    • Trading Systems
  • Trading
    • Order Types
    • Trading Costs
    • Trading Strategies
    • Track Keeping
  • Risk Management
    • Risikotypen
    • Money Management
    • Riskomanagement
beurteilung:
20% Homework Assignments: Technical Analysis

20% Homework Assignments: Trading & Track Keeping

20% Presentation Stock Exchange/academic publication (incl. peer reviews)

40% Test
